New Year

30 Dec 2017

The New Year is supposed to mark a time of reflection on the old year, and a sense of looking forward to the new one. Looking at the next year scares me so much, having no plan, direction. I think my resolution this year is just to make a resolution next year.
© Jonny Spicer
